name: Best in the West
description: Best in the West is an online multiplayer first person shooter. Each player starts in their own box car on an old western steam train. As the train whistle blows and the doors swing open players have 10 minutes duke it out. Enjoy free for all shotgun blasting, pistol wielding, wild west mayhem. Play online with other players as you fight for dominance in the backwoods. Enjoy a no/low lag experience from one of our many servers around the World.
